name: Run Dodger
description:
In this game, you play a character named Dodger your objective is to survive as long as possible by dodging many enemies in different directions, enemies will spawn more in each increasing round, and use available power-ups to help you survive, but if your health has reached 0 points you will lose the game. 

Controls:
W  and Up Arrow Key-> Move Up
A and Left Arrow Key-> Move Left
S and Down Arrow Key-> Move Down
D and Right Arrow Key-> Move Right

Credits:
Vieri Leonardy: Game Programmer, Game Designer, SFX, & Music.

Additional Asset Use From Unity Asset Store:
A Free Pixel Font - Thaleah by Tiny World
Free 2D Mega Pack by brackeys
Egypt Gladiators Tileset and Characters w/animations by gwlpxl
